005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticMetapathException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.stream.Stream;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Provides functions that evaluate a Metapath recursively over sequences.
029 */
030public final class MpRecurseDepth {
031  private static final String NAME = "recurse-depth";
032
033  @NonNull
034  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
035      .name(NAME)
036      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_EXTENDED)
037      .deterministic()
038      .contextDependent()
039      .focusDependent()
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("recursePath")
042          .type(IStringItem.class)
043          .one()
044          .build())
045      .returnType(INodeItem.class)
046      .returnZeroOrMore()
047      .functionHandler(MpRecurseDepth::executeOneArg)
048      .build();
049
050  @NonNull
051  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
052      .name(NAME)
053      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_EXTENDED)
054      .deterministic()
055      .contextDependent()
056      .focusIndependent()
057      .argument(IArgument.builder()
058          .name("context")
059          .type(INodeItem.class)
060          .zeroOrMore()
061          .build())
062      .argument(IArgument.builder()
063          .name("recursePath")
064          .type(IStringItem.class)
065          .one()
066          .build())
067      .returnType(INodeItem.class)
068      .returnZeroOrMore()
069      .functionHandler(MpRecurseDepth::executeTwoArg)
070      .build();
071
072  private MpRecurseDepth() {
073    // disable construction
074  }
075
076  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
077  @NonNull
078  private static ISequence<INodeItem> executeOneArg(
079      @NonNull IFunction function,
080      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
081      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
082      IItem focus) {
083
084    ISequence<INodeItem> initalContext = ISequence.of(FunctionUtils.requireType(INodeItem.class, focus));
085
086    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
087    IStringItem recursionPath = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arg.getFirstItem(true));
088
089    return recurseDepth(initalContext, recursionPath, dynamicContext);
090  }
091
092  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
093  @NonNull
094  private static ISequence<INodeItem> executeTwoArg(
095      @NonNull IFunction function,
096      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
097      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
098      IItem focus) {
099
100    ISequence<INodeItem> initalContext = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
101
102    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
103    IStringItem recursionPath = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arg.getFirstItem(true));
104
105    return recurseDepth(initalContext, recursionPath, dynamicContext);
106  }
107
108  @NonNull
109  private static ISequence<INodeItem> recurseDepth(
110      @NonNull ISequence<INodeItem> initialContext,
111      @NonNull IStringItem recursionPath,
112      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
113    MetapathExpression recursionMetapath;
114    try {
115      recursionMetapath = MetapathExpression.compile(recursionPath.asString(), dynamicContext.getStaticContext());
116    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
117      throw new StaticMetapathException(StaticMetapathException.INVALID_PATH_GRAMMAR, ex.getMessage(), ex);
118    }
119
120    return recurseDepth(initialContext, recursionMetapath, dynamicContext);
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Evaluates the {@code recursionMetapath} starting with the the items in the
125   * {@code initialContext} and also recursively using the resulting items
126   * returned by evaluating this path.
127   *
128   * @param initialContext
129   *          the sequence containing the initial node items to evaluate the
130   *          Metapath against
131   * @param recursionMetapath
132   *          the Metapath expression to use for recursive evaluation
133   * @param dynamicContext
134   *          the dynamic context supporting evaluation
135   * @return the Metapath node items resulting from the Metapath execution
136   */
137  @NonNull
138  public static ISequence<INodeItem> recurseDepth(
139      @NonNull ISequence<INodeItem> initialContext,
140      @NonNull MetapathExpression recursionMetapath,
141      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
142
143    return ISequence.of(ObjectUtils.notNull(initialContext.stream()
144        .flatMap(item -> {
145          @NonNull ISequence<INodeItem> metapathResult = recursionMetapath.evaluate(item, dynamicContext);
146          // ensure this is list backed
147          metapathResult.getValue();
148
149          ISequence<INodeItem> result = recurseDepth(metapathResult, recursionMetapath, dynamicContext);
150          return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(Stream.of(item), result.stream()));
151        })));
152  }
153}
